bill_title: provide for an additional one-time one percent pay supplement to state employees.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for an additional one-time one percent pay supplement to state employees. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Notwithstanding § 4-7-32, on July 1, 2007, or at such time that the fiscal year 2007 general fund ending unobligated cash balance is determined, if the unobligated cash balance is equal to or more than two million nine hundred forty thousand dollars, there is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of two million nine hundred forty thousand dollars ( $2,940,000 ), one million three hundred thousand dollars ($ 1,300,000 ) in federal fund expenditure authority, and two million seven hundred thirty thousand dollars ($ 2,730,000 ) in other fund expenditure authority; or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Bureau of Personnel for the purpose of a one-time one percent across-the-board pay supplement for state employees. Section 2. If the general fund ending unobligated cash balance on July 1, 2007, is less than two million nine hundred forty thousand dollars, there is hereby appropriated from the general fund the remaining unobligated cash balance to the Bureau of Personnel for the purpose of a one-time across-the-board pay supplement for state employees. There is hereby appropriated one million three hundred thousand dollars ($1,300,000) in federal fund expenditure authority and two million seven hundred thirty thousand dollars ($2,730,000) in other fund expenditure authority to the Bureau of Personnel; however, the amount of the supplement must maintain the same general fund, federal fund, and other fund proportion as represented in section 1 of this Act. Section 3. The supplement appropriated in section 1 or section 2 of this Act shall be in addition to the salary policy approved by the Eighty-second Legislature, and be given to all permanent employees of the executive, legislative, and judicial branches of state government. Section 4. Money appropriated by this Act shall be distributed to the executive, legislative, and judicial branches of state government in the same manner as the money appropriated for the cost of living adjustment in the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2008.
